about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Frontend Developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences.
about.description: With over 2 years of experience, I specialize in developing modern and responsive interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. My focus is on creating solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also provide an exceptional user experience.

portfolio3d.title: 3D Portfolio
portfolio3d.description: A modern and interactive portfolio built with Next.js, Three.js, and GSAP. Features a 3D car model that responds to user interaction and smooth animations for a unique experience.

todoApp.title: Todo App
todoApp.description: A simple and intuitive task application that allows users to efficiently manage daily tasks. Users can add, edit, remove tasks and mark them as completed.

streamVibe.title: Stream Vibe
streamVibe.description: A website that consumes the TMDB API, lists movie categories and allows users to add movies to their favorites.

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: An interactive age calculator that allows users to input a birth date and calculate the exact age in years, months, and days. Features real-time validation and an elegant interface.

crowdfund.title: Crowdfund Project
crowdfund.description: A crowdfunding project with a modern interface, featuring a responsive design built for desktop and mobile.
